alert.note: Alert for Stonewall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 12:26PM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Stonewall County through 100 PM CDT... At 1225 PM CDT, radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles south of Aspermont, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Aspermont and Old Glory. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
